welcome_message_body: Welcome to Bad Sassendorf, a charming town known for its natural springs and beautiful landscapes. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Paderborn/lippstadt Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and seasonal flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Guetersloh Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Guetersloh Airport, mainly used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Dortmund Airport, serving mainly low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
